ratings.comment: I would recommend not taking this class. I dreaded it each week.

Paper assignments were fine, exams tested you on silly facts that you'd think you wouldn't need to know. Exams were open book but the average was still bad (that's how picky the questions were). She did not explain her expectations clearly and would be upset when the class didn't understand. She makes the class difficult (the content isn't hard).

Paper assignments were fine (3 of them), but the exams were ridiculous. She even made them open note and the average was still awful, no curve. Her communication is poor. I think she probably was a great professor in the past but is losing her touch. In for a ride if you take this class.
